Articles.Content:
AMLV Orion II & MLS - Orion Exploration System

Okay so we've talked about an expanded diameter reusable Falcon 9 system paired with Orion, now lets look at some applications. Here we are pairing the reusable system with MLS, EUS ( TALUS ) and the venerable “Observatory Lander” to provide extended mission lunar exploration. Presumably the lander would offer it's own return to orbit capability based on the expanded delta V pool of the related systems to get it on the Munar ground with minimal use of on-board prop. Assembly altitude is 500 Km with initial Orion circularization at Chaka standard 152 Km. 

 

 

 

 

 

PS: Bad on KSP forums for not spell check recognizing the word circularization ... really??

 

Edited April 24, 2018 by YANFRET
Having same problems with Orion CSM Fairings causing massive explosions when decoupling the lower portion since 1.4....

15 hours ago, Kilo60 said:

Having same problems with Orion CSM Fairings causing massive explosions when decoupling the lower portion since 1.4....  

If you read the Topic

"[1.3.1] ♦ Chaka Monkey Evolution 131 X"

 

what did it say to you??? Right, it is for 1.3.1 and not for 1.4.x. Roll back your KSP to 1.3.1 and it works or wait until it is updatet.

Because we love you guys...

 

Chaka 1.4.X Beta Test Download

https://www.dropbox.com/s/lf082752sj46uhn/CHAKA 14X Beta.zip?dl=0

 

Enjoy; we're fully booked IRL to finish the update but you are welcome to the work as it stands tonight
So glad to see this mod has survived the two game versions I missed while taking time away from this game!

Thanks Yanfret and all others.

Truly a great mod.

Cheers.

AMLV - Orion II & AMLV - Exploration Habitat

 

 

 

 

Orion "Returns to Flight" with 1.4.3 certification

 

 

 

 

Edited May 6, 2018 by YANFRET

► Chaka Monkey Evolution ◄

Your desire to explore is sold here

 

 

 

► Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems 1.4.3 SpaceDock Download ◄

 

Click here to "Get Monkey"

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Chaka Monkey Exploration Odyssey is a space program based on NASA and Boeing proposals for future missions. Part models from a wide variety of authors have been licensed, and new original models made, then combined with all new textures, sizes and configurations, to create craft files depicting the proposed missions. This project is modeled at 75% real scale.

 

♦ Recommend installing this pack into a clean KSP install for the first time.

♦ Latest version of Raster Prop Monitor needed for IVA function. Link included in download.

♦ Copy everything in provided GameData to your GameData

♦ Copy VAB folder to Ships

♦ Copy Subassemblies to your save (optional)

♦ Please remove any previous version files before installing!

Chaka the Monkey would like to extend a special thank you to these developers. They worked very hard to make these parts and we have organized them for Monkey Exploration because they are excellent.

Also, Chaka wishes to thank our awesome 1.3 beta test team: @Space Kadet , @OV-102, @Jarlgnarök, @davidewei , and of course @MeCripp for putting in many hours of science which made the quality of this release possible. 

 

 

 

Special thanks to @rsparkyc for updating Procedural Fairings to 1.3!

Oops!

Hello all;

For some reason I am having problems with this latest version of CME.  My standard stock ships, as supplied by the download, are getting all flimsy and trying to break apart during launch.  I am using all of the same mods (mechjeb, kerbaljoint, etc) as i have in previous versions of KSP.

I am starting to run tests to try and trouble shoot this, but i was wondering if anyone else has seen this problem with the latest release of KSP 1.4.3 and this latest release.

thanks for any and all help, ideas or other.

 

 

Found the problem.

somehow i had a corrupted version of KJE.

All works as it should now.

Cheers.

Edited May 15, 2018 by drtedastro
found problem

Hello, I have started playing this pack and it's really awesome!

I am reading the Product Information Cards about the Duna mission, but I am confused about how the various Tranfer Vehicle, Drop Tank, etc.., must be used, it involves a lot of docking and undocking but it's not clear to me at all. Can someone please explain ?

Thanks

On 5/16/2018 at 9:34 AM, Maraz said:

Hello, I have started playing this pack and it's really awesome!

I am reading the Product Information Cards about the Duna mission, but I am confused about how the various Tranfer Vehicle, Drop Tank, etc.., must be used, it involves a lot of docking and undocking but it's not clear to me at all. Can someone please explain ?

Thanks

Great!

The idea is to assemble the vehicle and turn off fuel consumption on all the tanks except the center one, then burn it out completely to get the fastest transfer speed possible. Once spent, the vehicle splits by un docking into the 3 sections, and the center drop tank can be discarded. Once out of the way, the drive section and habitation section can re dock and complete the mission.

 

Cheers!

14 hours ago, YANFRET said:

Thanks a lot !
